page.title: 18CUSTOMS CONTINUED
page.content: &MRS Muir. After the fancy dress there are races for different ages which start with the flat race. While the races are going on there are different side shows set up by local groups. There was a {fish for ducks }for toddlers, an {aunt sally,}a {bottle {stall,}a tea and coffee stall and a mini bar, {target golf }and {throwing {the wellie. }There were parachutists who were brilliant, one of them landed in the Roman Camps though he wasn't meant to! The pipers played some more music then there was a tug of war. The teams were {Landward, Ardoch {and Grinnan, Greenhaugh and the Alloa {Pipers. Landward } was the winner but it was very close. After that was the school relay, Braco against Greenloaning - Greenloaning won! The {Fun Run}was next which goes right round the Castle Drive (3 miles).
